page.title: 11EDUCATION IN WOODBOROUGH
page.content: The bad economic climate,racial issues and striking teachers are affecting our schools.Some older people think most children do very well,have plenty of choice and are well-behaved. People like a community-spirit,good behaviour,smart dress,happy and polite children and nice school fields.They say the action of teachers is hurting the image of the village school,is disruptive and unnecessary;that schools need more money to be more efficient."They should teach four Rs:Reading,wRiting,Reckoning,and Right from wRong!". Mr.G.Ellis,the head of the village Primary,commented,"In spite of the current unrest,the school continued to demand excellence.New syllabi in Topic and Science were introduced.Our end-of -term concert is'David',by Roger Jones,with 3 Redhill pupils playing"
